text:
I recently had the opportunity to experience the software development services provided by DxMinds and I would like to share my review.

First and foremost, I was highly impressed with the quality of the software solutions delivered by them. Their team demonstrated a strong understanding of my requirements and translated them into robust, scalable, and user-friendly software applications.
Overall, my experience was highly positive. Their software development services are of top-notch quality, and their professionalism, expertise, and customer support make them a reliable choice for businesses seeking software solutions. I

DxMinds offers a fulfilling work environment with a positive culture, opportunities for growth, and cutting-edge projects. The talented team, work-life balance, and open communication make it a great place to work for mobile app development professionals. Highly recommended.

It‚Äôs always a pleasure to work in a company that provides great opportunities to prove what they can do for the company. DxMinds is one of the best mobile app development company in Bangalore, that provides such great opportunities in an awesome environment. As a person who has been working for DxMinds I am very happy to be part of such a family.

Extremely Disappointed with Unprofessionalism

I had an utterly disappointing experience with this vendor. The project was delayed significantly, and the infrastructure provided fell far short of our initial discussions. The lack of proper testing only exacerbated the issues. To make matters worse, they failed to pay GST, reflecting a concerning lack of financial responsibility. Additionally, the product was implemented in a manner completely inconsistent with the agreed-upon design. Overall, this vendor's performance has been subpar, and I strongly advise others to consider alternatives. They didnt even design the infra properly, I got a **SECUIRTY BREACH** email from AWS for the infra they designed and hosted the application. Their ceo or team does not take any responsibility for this and they didn't even try respond this when we reached out to them for solving it.

Not only did this vendor disappoint with project delays and subpar work, but the CEO's complete lack of responsiveness after payment is beyond frustrating. Emails have gone unanswered, leaving me with unresolved concerns. This level of unprofessionalism, from the top down, is unacceptable. It's disheartening to see such a disregard for customer communication and satisfaction. Beware before engaging with this company; their after-sales service is severely

Impressed with DxMinds' commitment to excellence, they stand out as the best in Bangalore for creating cutting-edge mobile app needs.
Thanks Dx Minds
Pleasure to work with you üòç

text:
I have been working with Trigent  Software (IT Services) since 2019. Trigent as an organization is excellent and provided us the best platform to bring out all our skills. The managers and Leads are very helpful and always in an positive mood which encourages us a lot to have positive attitude. text:
I have been working at the Trigent Software IT Services division since February 2020 and it's been a wonderful journey. The company has a great work culture and gives you a lot of opportunities to learn and grow. They cater to clients from various industries and have an expert team in mobile app development, automated testing, and cloud-related services.‚Ä®They have won prestigious awards from international organizations for their quality of work.

What I really like is their flexible timing, WFH policy, no micro-managing managers, no questions asked leave policy, good pay scale, and hike every year. They identify and appreciate your work through awards and gift vouchers. For team bonding, they have team outings and team lunches every quarter. During tough times of COVID, the HRs reached out to employees and checked for their well-being, and supported them in every way possible. All these qualities make Trigent IT Services a great company to work for.
company: Trigent Software Pvt. Ltd. - IT Services Division

text: Best company to start your career. I have been working from past 4 years in Trigent as a QA engineer, and I got an opportunity to develop skills in my domain. The work culture here is very good and got wonderful experience working with team leads and managers.

text:
I have over 17 years of experience in IT Industry and have had my share of working with quiet a few large organizations before joining Trigent IT Services. I am part of Trigent family for almost 3 years. The work environment is very welcoming & conducive towards bringing out the best performance from each of its employees. The company culture promotes recognition, inclusivity, Management team is approachable & work towards employee friendly processes. It provides excellent work-life balance. More than half of our employee strength have been with Trigent for a long duration of their experience which confirms the employee satisfaction with the company.

Our IT Services cater to various technology clients across various domains like Finance, Health, Hi-Tech, Manufacturing, Retail to name a few. A large share of the revenue comes from repeat customers, plus customer references, which is a vouch in itself about the excellent services and customer satisfaction.

Working for this company is a Win-Win as highly satisfied customers lead to stable work environment and employees can also expand on their technical & professional experience. Overall, I highly recommended Trigent IT Services as an employer.
